title: Which country has the highest number of traditional musical instruments? - Quora

response.answer_text: I truly believe it is really hard to know. So I propose every Quoran landing on this question to make a list of instruments from their country or any country they think has many traditional instruments. Since I'm from Chile, the longest country in the world. Considering its geography, it gives for a wide variety of instruments. I will provide with a list of traditional instruments from here. Notice that most of them have origins in Europe. CHILE TormentoGuitarAccordeonBandoneonFlutePanfluteHarpGuitarrónViolinPianoKultrúnBomboTrumpetTubaQuenaZampoñaCharangoCharrangoTamborineSnareBandurria
